component.name: GetVideoUrlTask
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "fetchUrl" end sub
function fetchUrl() request = CreateObject("roUrlTransfer") request.SetCertificatesFile("common:/certs/ca-bundle.crt") request.AddHeader("X-Roku-Reserved-Dev-Id", "") request.InitClientCertificates() request.SetUrl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nddery/roku-qc-tv-channels/master/radio-canada/url.txt") m.top.url = request.GetToString().trim() end function
